subject: Public Speaking
title: Frederick Douglass: Former Slave
description: One-minute skill: Frederick Douglass: Former Slave.

hook.text: Douglass was born enslaved. He taught himself to read and became legendary.

buildup.text: His speeches combined personal testimony with intellectual argument.

discovery.text: He showed the most powerful speeches come from lived experience.

twist.text: His eloquence itself was an argument: enslaved people deserve freedom.

climax.text: His voice challenged the dehumanization of slavery.

punchline.text: Speak from experience. Your story is credibility.
